original_text: And ye shall teach them your children, speaking of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
korean_text: 또 그것을 너희의 자녀에게 가르치며 집에 앉아 있을 때에든지, 길을 갈 때에든지, 누워 있을 때에든지, 일어날 때에든지 이 말씀을 강론하고

sentences.original_text: And ye shall teach them your children
speaking of them when thou sittest in thine house
sentences.korean_translation: 네 집에 앉아 있을 때 그것을 말하며

sentences.original_text: and when thou walkest by the way
